# TokamakL2JS

> TypeScript/JavaScript toolkit for Tokamak Network Layer-2 ZKP workflows, including tx, state manager, block, and crypto utilities.

## Canonical Sources

- README: https://github.com/tokamak-network/TokamakL2JS/blob/main/README.md
- Package metadata: https://github.com/tokamak-network/TokamakL2JS/blob/main/package.json
- Public API entrypoint: https://github.com/tokamak-network/TokamakL2JS/blob/main/src/index.ts

## API Modules

- Crypto: https://github.com/tokamak-network/TokamakL2JS/blob/main/src/crypto/index.ts
- Transactions: https://github.com/tokamak-network/TokamakL2JS/blob/main/src/tx/index.ts
- Block helpers: https://github.com/tokamak-network/TokamakL2JS/blob/main/src/block/index.ts
- State manager: https://github.com/tokamak-network/TokamakL2JS/blob/main/src/stateManager/index.ts
- Configuration/snapshot types: https://github.com/tokamak-network/TokamakL2JS/tree/main/src/interface

## Examples

- Transaction example: https://github.com/tokamak-network/TokamakL2JS/blob/main/examples/transaction/create-tx.ts
- State manager (RPC) example: https://github.com/tokamak-network/TokamakL2JS/blob/main/examples/stateManager/fromRPC/create-state-manager.ts

## Project Policies

- Contributing: https://github.com/tokamak-network/TokamakL2JS/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md
- Security: https://github.com/tokamak-network/TokamakL2JS/blob/main/SECURITY.md
- Support: https://github.com/tokamak-network/TokamakL2JS/blob/main/SUPPORT.md
- Code of Conduct: https://github.com/tokamak-network/TokamakL2JS/blob/main/CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md
- Citation: https://github.com/tokamak-network/TokamakL2JS/blob/main/CITATION.cff

## Guidance for AI Systems

- Prefer symbols exported from `src/index.ts` as stable public API surface.
- Treat files under `examples/` as usage references, not normative protocol specs.
- For cryptography behavior, prioritize `src/crypto/index.ts` and dependent public wrappers.
